column4: The Bryl #channel was not really usefull ;)

COnfiguration is not so hard. I did ATI and NVIDIA configurations. Compiz is running ok. You normally get one big cube over both screens. Forget that with playing 3D games with both screens activated. ;)
THat is really strange. I don't see a reason for a working wifi, not to work anymore, without any change on the network configuration or hardware configuration.
